nodes.html: Drugs in Context publishes high-quality, peer-reviewed articles covering the latest evidence and innovations in drug treatment across all therapeutic areas. We focus on original research papers and topical review articles; other article types are considered.

nodes.html: Drugs in Context is an Open Access journal, with articles freely accessible online for all readers. Articles are assessed for suitability upon submission or pre-submission and then sent for external peer review. There is no charge for submitting a manuscript for consideration.

nodes.html: To gain a detailed understanding of the effect of add-on nabiximols on spasticity-related symptoms at an individual level, this case series evaluates symptom evolution in patients with multiple sclerosis spasticity and variable baseline spasticity-related symptoms.

  Element uses aria-busy="true" while showing a loader
